SEARCH
Package org.fluentjdbc

Class DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseBulkQueryable<T,DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder<T>>, DatabaseBulkUpdatable<T,DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder<T>>
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault public class DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder<T> extends Object implements DatabaseBulkQueryable<T,DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder<T>>, DatabaseBulkUpdatable<T,DatabaseBulkUpdateBuilder<T>>
Fluently generate a UPDATE ... statement for a list of objects. Create with a list of object and use setField(String, Function) to pass in a function that will be called for each object in the list to create the SET field = ? value and where(String, Function) which will be called for each object to create the WHERE field = ? value.

Example:

     public void updateAll(List<TagType> tagTypes, Connection connection) {
         tagTypesTable.bulkUpdate(tagTypes)
              .where("id", TagType::getId)
              .setField("name", TagType::getName)
              .execute(connection);
     }

    • execute

      public int execute(Connection connection)
      Executes UPDATE table SET field = ?, ... WHERE field = ? AND ... and calls PreparedStatement.addBatch() for each row
      Returns:
      the sum count of all the rows updated
